entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 over exposed coastal sections this evening. Wind becoming light late this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Wednesday 12 April 2023
